channel.title: TravelgateX Documentation – Distribution
channel.description: Recent changes in Distribution on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Distribution: Overview
item.description:
In this documentation we will describe what the TravelgateX Distribution Module is (here in after Distribution-X), but also indicate what Distribution-X is not - it’s as important to know in detail what functionalities it offers as those not! Distribution-X: it’s a rules engine Distribution-X is a rules engine for the distribution of hotel products. The main rules that this solution offers are grouped into: Pricing Rules The main potential of Distribution-X lies in the versatility when it comes to defining complex rules to define the sales price.
[...]

item.description:
Under construction! We have logged this resource on our roadmap and we are currently working through extending all of the resources in our documentation. If you need specific resources (such as this page), please let us know by using one of the following channels: Join us on Slack and let us know what resources you need us to prirotize Send us a Jira service desk request Log an issues request with us Write this page yourself!
